Reviews.Title: Good but priced high
Reviews.Author: Robert Arikian
Reviews.Content: This mounting post was easy to install (cement) and looks great. The price is way out of line with the actual material. Why do they charge so much? (Because they can).

ProductInfo.Features:
For the easy installation of keypads, telephone entry systems, and other access control products.
Curb mount configuration
Rugged, weather resistant, powder coated rolled steel construction
niversal bolt pattern on base plate and faceplate fits all manufacturer's products
ProductInfo.Name: Linear Gnc-1 Curb-Mount Gooseneck Post
